Row
---------------------

```{r}
#| title: Are Things Good?
#| component: valuebox

currentVal <- sample(1:200, 1)

icon <- "hand-thumbs-up"
color <- "primary"
if (currentVal < 100) {
  icon <- "hand-thumbs-down"
  color <- "secondary"
}

list(
  value=currentVal,
  color=color,
  icon=icon
)
```
